data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Gilan, Iran.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gilan, Iran
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Gilan, Iran to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, convict the 13,184 believers in Gilan to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Gilan, Iran to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Taromi, Upper people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Taromi, Upper people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Taromi, Upper people is yours.
Over 98.13 percent of the people of Gilan are far from Jesus.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Gilan to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Gilan to exponentially multiply disciples.
